InstallationÂ¶

First of all, you have to know that Pyenty was developed and tested using Python 3 (3.4) and before start, you have to install the following dependencies.

Tornado:

pip install tornado

Motor:

pip install motor

And finally, install Pyenty:

pip install pyenty

For persistency, motor connects to highly scalable database MongoDB. Download and install the latest version.
